Title: EnOceanNet
Description:
EnOceanNet is at .NET API for the Thermokon STC-Ethernet transceiver, that is based on the TCM 120 EnOcean module. The source code is written i C#.

The API operates in TCP server mode and supports multiple transceivers simultaneously.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

EnOceanNet is at .NET API for the Thermokon STC-Ethernet transceiver, that is based on the TCM 120 EnOcean module. The source code is written i C#.

The API operates in TCP server mode and supports multiple transceivers simultaneously.

Samples

See the source code for samples.
  • Discovery - Find transievers on the LAN.
  • ChangeSettings - Update transiever settings.
  • Receive - Receive sensor data.
  • ReceiveVerbose - Receive sensor data with more detailed output to the console.
  • Send - Send and receive sensor data.
